puts "Input a digit to check if it's a digit"

#check_digit function checks if the num is a digit or not a digit.

num = gets.to_i

def check_digit(num)

	unless num >= 10 
		puts "Digit"
	else
		puts "Not a Digit"
	end
end

#call thr function

check_digit(num)

php:
<?php
function checkDigit($digits) {
    if (ctype_digit($digits)) {
        echo "Digit\n";
    } else {
        echo "Not a digit\n";
    }
}
checkDigit('1')
?>
